column5: anyone know when the season opens in 2012? I'm assuming its may 20th but can't seem to find anything online about it. thanks Kevin
Opening dates are zone specific. Last year reg's covered 2 seasons but it looks like they're back to 1 yr only. Email the MRNFhttp://www.mrnfp.gouv.qc.ca/english/...contact-us.asp
Thanks Freytown. They said the unofficial date for Zone 14 (Gouin Res) is May 18. The official date will be released in February.
